title: Do You Realize?
quote: The sun doesn't go down, it's just an illusion caused by the world spinning 'round

title: Day I Die
quote: Let's just get high enough to see our problems; let's just get high enough to see our Fathers' houses

title: I Don't Care
quote: As long as you can dance me 'round the room while you lie to me

title: Montreal
quote: Happiness exists when you don't know a thing

title: Only One
quote: No you're not perfect, but you're not your mistakes

title: Cologne
quote: And in my hotel room I'm wondering if you read that story too.  And if we both might be having the same imaginary conversation

title: No Regrets
quote: I've never had a dream in my life, cause a dream is what you want to do and still haven't pursued.  I knew what I wanted and did it til it was done, so I've been the dream I wanted to be since day one.

title: Makeshift Patriot
quote: We taught that dog to squat, how dare he do that shit in our own backyard?

title: We Both Go Down Together
quote: And while your head is spinning, hold tight, it's just beginning

title: May Your Hearts Stay Strong
quote: I like the way you touch me, it makes me feel like I have no skeleton

title: Consequence
quote: Fail with consequence, lose with eloquence and smile

title: Carry the Zero
quote: And you've become what you thought was dumb, a fraction of the sum

title: Twilight
quote: Go off to sleep in the sunshine, I don't want to see the day when it's dying

title: Blood Of a Young Wolf
quote: Afraid to fly and so I'm running

title: Brand New Colony
quote: I'll be the grapes fermented, bottled & served with the table set.  In my finest suit, like a perfect gentleman

title: No Revolution
quote: Let's light a match to these dynamite dreams.  Let's let it all go, set it all free.  I call for the outcasts, the losers, and the creeps.  Who can bring it back again, make me believe?

title: I Will Be There When You Die
quote: There will be bigotry and there will be open minds. There will be days of peace you'll never have the time.  As long as you keep a straight face, I will be there when you die
